item.title: Maryam add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Maryam add a quote by Gordon A. Eadie
item.description: "If you don't stand for something you will fall for anything." -- Gordon A. Eadie

item.title: Maryam add a quote by Helen Keller
item.description: "When one door of happiness closes, another opens; but often we look so long at the closed door that we do not see the one which has been opened for us." -- Helen Keller

item.title: Maryam add a quote by Anaïs Nin
item.description: "We don't see things as they are, we see them as we are." -- Anaïs Nin

item.title: Maryam add a quote by Bill Cosby
item.description: "I don't know the key to success, but the key to failure is trying to please everyone." -- Bill Cosby

item.title: Maryam add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Maryam add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Maryam add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Maryam add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Reality is merely an illusion, albeit a very persistent one." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Maryam add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Logic will get you from A to Z; imagination will get you everywhere." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Maryam add a quote by Narcotics Anonymous
item.description: "Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results." -- Narcotics Anonymous

item.title: Maryam add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Maryam add a quote by Allen Saunders
item.description: "Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans." -- Allen Saunders

item.title: Maryam add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Maryam add a quote by Pablo Picasso
item.description: "Everything you can imagine is real." -- Pablo Picasso

item.title: Maryam add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "A person's a person, no matter how small." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Maryam add a quote by Thomas A. Edison
item.description: "I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work." -- Thomas A. Edison

item.title: Maryam add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "Peace begins with a smile.." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Maryam add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Maryam add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "It's the possibility of having a dream come true that makes life interesting." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Maryam add a quote by Paul McCartney
item.description: "And, in the end The love you take is equal to the love you make." -- Paul McCartney

item.title: Maryam add a quote by Sam Levenson
item.description: "For Attractive lips, speak words of kindness. &emsp;For lovely eyes, seek out the good in people. &emsp;For a slim figure, share your food with the hungry. &emsp;For beautiful hair, let a child run their fingers through it once a day. &emsp;For poise, walk with the knowledge that you never walk alone. &emsp;People, more than things, have to be restored, renewed, revived, reclaimed, and redeemed. Remember, if you ever need a helping hand, you will find one at the end of each of your arms. &emsp;As you grow older, you will discover that you have two hands, one for helping yourself and the other for helping others." -- Sam Levenson

item.title: Maryam add a quote by Confucius
item.description: "If you make a mistake and do not correct it, this is called a mistake." -- Confucius

item.title: Maryam add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "If you can't fly then run, if you can't run then walk, if you can't walk then crawl, but whatever you do you have to keep moving forward." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Maryam add a quote by Norman Vincent Peale
item.description: "Shoot for the moon. Even if you miss, you'll land among the stars." -- Norman Vincent Peale

item.title: Maryam add a quote by Audrey Hepburn
item.description: "Nothing is impossible, the word itself says 'I'm possible'!" -- Audrey Hepburn

item.title: Maryam add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Our greatest glory is not in never failing, but in rising up every time we fail." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Maryam add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "He's like a drug for you, Bella." -- Stephenie Meyer

item.title: Maryam add a quote by Ernest Hemingway
item.description: "All thinking men are atheists." -- Ernest Hemingway

item.title: Maryam add a quote by John Henry Newman
item.description: "I sought to hear the voice of God and climbed the topmost steeple, but God declared: "Go down again - I dwell among the people." -- John Henry Newman
